details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################

##

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

Text: 실(AR)을 이용하여 가구의 조립 순서대로 3d로 띄워 사용자들이 설명서 없이 가구조립을 보다 쉽게 할 수 있도록 한다. - 개발 환경 : Microsoft Windows 10 - 개발 언어 : c# script, kotlin - 개발 도구 : Android Studio, Unity, Vuforia, Visual Studio, Autodesk 3ds Max

headline: cse-capstone2022
content:
| 0                                                                         | 1   | 2   |
|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------|:----|:----|
| 팀명                                                                        |     |     |
| Adot                                                                      |     |     |
| 잘조립                                                                       |     |     |
| 작품개요                                                                      |     |     |
| 증강현실로 보는 가구조립 설명서 어플리케이션으로 Android App으로 접속해서 핸드폰 카메라로 가구                 |     |     |
| 의 바코드나 설명서에 있는 완성된 가구의 입체도 또는 사진 등을 인식하여 해당 가구의 조립법을 증강현                  |     |     |
| 실(AR)을 이용하여 가구의 조립 순서대로 3d로 띄워 사용자들이 설명서 없이 가구조립을 보다 쉽게 할 수               |     |     |
| 있도록 한다.                                                                   |     |     |
| 주요 적용 기술 및 구조                                                             |     |     |
| - 개발 환경 : Microsoft Windows 10                                            |     |     |
| - 개발 언어 : c# script, kotlin                                               |     |     |
| - 개발 도구 : Android Studio, Unity, Vuforia, Visual Studio, Autodesk 3ds Max |     |     |
| 56                                                                        |     |     |
| 한성대학교 컴퓨터 공학부                                                             |     |     |

page: 58
headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 지도교수 : 작품 소개 사진 기대효과 2022 캡스톤디자인 작품 발표회 Department of Computer Engineering 57 국적과 나이 관계없이 설명서를 직접적으로 이해하지 않아도 3d로 조립 방법을 설명하고 보여줌으로써 가구조립을 잘 이해할 수 있도록 제공하며, 또한 설명서의 작은 글씨를 잘 읽지 못하는 노약자에게도 편리함을 제공한다. 염세영(팀장) : unity 가구 움직임 구현 및 3d모델링, vuforia적용 김지현 : 안드로이드 앱 개발 및 unity 연동, vuforia적용 이주연 : 안드로이드 앱 개발 및 unity 연동, vuforia적용 이채린 : unity 가구 움직임 구현 및 3d모델링, vuforia적용 조세홍 교수님

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

Text: 공학부 EscapeH EscapeH VR 멀티플레이 방탈출 게임 방탈출은 접근성이 좋으며, 서울에만 160개가 넘는 점포가 있고, 많은 사람들이 즐기는 놀이이자 오락거리이다. 뿐만 아니라 방탈출이라는 오락의 한 장르는 방송의 소재로도 자주 사용이 된다. (대표적으로 tvN의 ‘대탈출’이라는 프로그램이 있다.) 이러한 매체를 통해 방탈출의 인기는 점차 증가하고 있으며, 규모와 테마의 수도 커지고 있다. EscapeH는 2인용 멀티플레이 VR 방탈출 게임이며, 기본적으로 HMD를 통해 외부(현실세계)와 시각을 차단한 후 가상세계를 보여주며, Controller를 통한 물체와의 상호작용으로 현실감을 더욱 높였다. - 개발 환경 및 도구 : Unity, Visual Studio, Photon - 개발 언어 : C# - 하드웨어 : Oculus Quest2 (Headset, Controller), gtx970 이상의 그래픽카드

headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 지도교수 : 작품 소개 사진 기대효과 2022 캡스톤디자인 작품 발표회 Department of Computer Engineering 63 김진모 교수님 김민준 : 기획, 스크립트 작성, 제출물 관리 김우성 : 기획, Photon Server 손성한 : 기획, 시나리오 설계, 디자인 전현우 : 기획, 디자인, 스크립트 작성 (1) 오프라인 방탈출의 한계점 - 공간의 제약이 있다. 물론 현실에 직접 들어가 즐기는 것이기 때문에 몰입감은 좋지만 움직일 수 있는 공 간은 건물의 내부, 방의 내부로 한정된다. (2) 온라인 비디오 방탈출 게임의 한계점 - 아무래도 직접 경험하는 것이 아닌, 마우스와 키보드를 이용한 플레이를 하기 때문에 몰입도가 떨어진다. (키보드도 거의 활용할 일이 없고 대부분 마우스로만 진행된다) 위와 같은 한계점들을 상호 보완할 수 있는 VR기기를 활용해 즐길 수 있다.

details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################
Output:
("entity"<|>가람교육재단<|>ORGANIZATION<|>교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지하는 재단)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>CHAPTER<|>제 1 장 총칙: 가람교육재단 정관의 첫 번째 장으로, 설립목적과 명칭에 관한 내용을 포함함. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 1 조 설립목적: 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 2 조 명칭: 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 운영규정 제 1 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 1 조 목적: 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다. 이 내용은 가람교육재단 운영규정 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>페이지 1<|>PAGE<|>가람교육재단 정관 문서의 1페이지에는 제 1 장 총칙과 제 1 조 설립목적, 제 2 조 명칭이 포함되어 있음. 가람교육재단 운영규정의 1페이지에는 제 1 조 목적이 포함되어 있음.)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 1 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 2 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)
##

##

##

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 작품개요 주요 적용 기술 및 구조 팀명 66 한성대학교 컴퓨터 공학부 JMT 열한시 2인 협동 탈출 RPG 게임 산업은 언택트 사회를 지나면서 전 세계에서 가장 크게 성장한 분야 중 하나이다. ‘열한시’는 이러한 흐름에 맞춰 협동 시스템을 적용한 탈출 롤플레잉 게임으로, 게이머들에게 소통과 연결을 중심으로 하는 새로운 재미를 주기 위해 제작되었다. 플레이어들은 미래 시대의 우주 탐사 기지가 배경인 스토리를 진행 하며 등장하는 다양한 퍼즐 기믹을 해결해 나간다. 퍼즐은 캐릭터 또는 물체와 상호작용하는 아이템을 이 용하여 해결할 수 있다. 탐사 기지를 탈출하는 것을 게임의 가장 큰 목표로 진행

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

details.prompt:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################
Output:
("entity"<|>가람교육재단<|>ORGANIZATION<|>교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지하는 재단)
##

##

##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 1 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################
Output:
(“entity”<|>Hansung University<|>organization<|>컴퓨터공학부에서 행정 및 조교를 모집하는 한성대학교)

Text: � 메타버스 캠퍼스 HSU_On은 코로나 바이러스로 인해 캠퍼스 생활이 비대면으로 진행됨으로써 아직 학교를 잘 모르는 신입 생 학우들과 비대면으로 학교를 오지 않는 재학생 학우들을 대상으로 게임형 가상현실 메타버스로 한성대 학교 캠퍼스를 구현하여 학교에 대해 소개하고, 게임 속에 미니게임, 퀘스트, 랜덤 뽑기 등 여러 컨텐츠를 구상하여 그저 가상으로 학교 캠퍼스를 돌아다니는 것이 아닌, 보다 흥미롭게 학교를 알아갈 수 있는 작품 을 만들었다. 그리고 전체 채팅, 귓속말 시스템을 통해 여러 학우들이 온라인으로 커뮤니케이션이 가능하 여 학우들끼리 친목을 도모할 수 있다. 본 작품은 구글 플레이스토어, 앱스토어에 업로드하여 쉽게 다운로 드하여 플레이 할 수 있다. - 타겟플랫폼 : Android, iOS, PC - 개발환경 : MacOS, Windows - 개발도구 : Unity, Visual Studio, Firebase - 개발언어 : C#

page: 80
headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 지도교수 : 작품 소개 사진 기대효과 2022 캡스톤디자인 작품 발표회 Department of Computer Engineering 79 학교 입장에서는 학교를 홍보할 수 있다는 점이 있다. 콘텐츠를 개선하거나, 수정만 한다면, 기존 학교 홍보에 사용했던 지류 팸플릿을 나눠주는 원시적인 방법을 사용하지 않고도, IT 세대에 걸맞은 홍보를 진행할 수 있다. 개발자 입장에서는 게임형 메타버스 콘텐츠이기 때문에 패널형 광고를 통해 수익을 창출할 수 있다. 요즘 구글 플레이스토어에 인기 게임들을 보면 메타버스를 활용한 게임도 많지만, 여러가지의 간단하고 즐기기 좋은 스낵형 게임이 많다. 그런 게임들을 직접 하나하나씩 플레이해 본 결과, 수익을 얻는 구조가 공통적으로 패널형 광고로 게임 인터페이스 하단이나 사이드에 위치해 있다. 그래서 우리 HSU_On도 마찬가지로 최근 방식을 수용하여 경제성을 챙겨간다면, 플레이어가 게임하는 환경에 불편을 미치지 않을 수 있도록 게임 인터페이스 측면에 광고를 삽입하여 수익을 창출해 경제성을 확보할 수 있다고 생각한다. 사용자 입장에서는 학교를 직접 찾아가지 않아도 학교에 대한 궁금한 정보를 HSU_On을 통해서 쉽게 찾아볼 수 있고, 채팅과 미니게임을 통해 여러 한성대학교 학우들과 친목을 도모할 수 있다. 또, 학교와 관련된 퀴즈형 퀘스트를 하나 하나 풀어가면서 학교에 대해 더욱 자세히 알 수 있다. 우리 코딩하는 쿼카 팀은 2021년 2학기 축제 때 운영하고 배포한 경험을 바탕으로 이번 2022년 신입생 오리엔테이션에 맞춰 캠퍼스 필드를 개선하고 제한적이였던 플랫폼을 확장
######################

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

page: 5
headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 작품개요 주요 적용 기술 및 구조 팀명 시각장애인을 위한 스마트 시스템 후천적 사고, 질환으로 인하여 장애를 겪고 있는 사람이 많다. 그중에서 시각장애를 겪고 있는 사람들에 게 조금이라도 도움을 주는 시스템 구현하였다. 점자를 인식하여 번역하고 읽어주는 기능, 글자를 인식 하여 번역하고 읽어주는 기능, 주변 자동차에 대한 경보 기능, 날씨를 읽어주는 기능을 구현하였다. - 개발 환경 : Raspbian, Ubuntu, Windows 10, Mac OS - 개발 언어 : Python - 개발 도구 : VSCode, Pycharm, vi editor, Google Cloud Vision, Google Trans, Open Weather Map - 핵심 기술 : DeepLearning(CNN), TTS 4 한성대학교 컴퓨터 공학부 ⠠⠠⠾⠈⠍⠐⠕(썬구리)

details.prompt: MANY entities and relationships were missed in the last extraction. Remember to ONLY emit entities that match any of the previously extracted types. Add them below using the same format:

history.content:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관

content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정

- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

headline: cse-capstone2022
content:
| 0                                                        | 1   | 2   | 3   | 4   | 5   | 6   | 7   |
|:---------------------------------------------------------|:----|:----|:----|:----|:----|:----|:----|
| 2022 캡스톤디자인 작품 발표회                                       |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 지도교수 :                                                   |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 송본호 : 총괄 기획, 스크립트 작성                                     |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 윤현수 : 몬스터 디자인, 시스템 구현                                    |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 이우현 : 월드 디자인                                             |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 이효진 : UI 디자인, 사운드 설계                                     |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 작품 소개 사진                                                 |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 기대효과                                                     |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 두터운 매니아 층을 가진 두 장르의 적절한 융합을 통하여 기존 잠재적 게이머들의 욕구를 충족시켜 플레 |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 이어로서 확보함과 동시에 기존 게임과는 다른 개성적이고 차별화된 재미를 느끼게 한다. 게이머들의 긍  |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 정적 평가는 게임 시장에서 융합된 장르의 게임에 대한 사람들의 관심도를 높이는 효과를 가져올 것이다. |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 이는 게임 제작사로 하여금 게임에 차별화된 요소를 추가하게 만드는 계기가 될 것이며 기존 고착화된 게 |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 임 요소 변화에 긍정적인 영향을 줄 것이다.                                 |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| 71                                                       |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |
| Department  of Computer Engineering                      |     |     |     |     |     |     |     |

page: 73
headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 작품개요 주요 적용 기술 및 구조 팀명 72 한성대학교 컴퓨터 공학부 큐티 가상 의료시술 시뮬레이션 가상 의료 시술에 더욱 적합한 고해상도 변형체 가시화와 Qt를 이용한 편리한 GUI 의료 시술 전 가상 의료 시술 계획을 수립할 경우 의료 품질이 향상된다. 위 프로그램은 GPU의 병렬 변형 체 계산을 통해 보다 정밀하고 빠르게 수행하여 랜더링한다. 화면에 출력된 변형체는 상황에 맞는 움직임 을 보이며 구현한 UI를 통해 사용자의 조작으로 실시간 가시화가 가능하다. - 개발환경 : Window - 개발언어 : C/C++, CUDA C, OpenGL - 개발도구 : Visual Studio 2019, Qt

details.prompt:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################
Output:

##

Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################

page: 77
headline: cse-capstone2022
content: 작품개요 주요 적용 기술 및 구조 팀명 76 한성대학교 컴퓨터 공학부 코딩쿤스트 Coding Kunst 오름(O.Room) VR 기술을 적용한 가상 회의실 Unity로 채팅과 VR 미팅룸을 하나의 프로그램으로 구현하여 별도의 프로그램 실행 없이 가상 현실 회의실 을 사용할 수 있도록 환경을 구현하였다. Photon을 통해 멀티 플레이를 지원하며, 기본적인 Text chat뿐 만 아니라 Voice chat 기능을 제공한다. 사무용 프로그램인 만큼 접근성을 높이기 위하여 Windows 운영 체제에서 실행되도록 구현하였다. - 개발 환경 : Microsoft Windows 10, MacOS - 개발 도구 : Unity, VScode, Visual Studio, Playfab, Photon - 개발 언어 : C#

details.prompt:
-Goal-
Given a text document that may or may not be structured into chapters, sections, and articles, and a list of entity types, identify all entities of those types from the text and all relationships among the identified entities.

-Mandatory Structural Rules-
- Each article (제 X 조) must be extracted as a distinct entity.
- All "Article X"s in the document must be extracted as entities without omission. Not a single one can be missing.
- If multiple articles are combined into one chunk, split them and extract each one separately as its own entity.
- The **entire content of each Article (제 X 조)** must be included verbatim or paraphrased in the `entity_description` of the corresponding `ARTICLE` entity.
- The entity_description must end with the following string in Korean: "이 내용은 [headline] 문서에서 추출함. [page]페이지에 위치함."
- Details within an article (such as 항 or 항목) must be nested or clearly described as part of that article’s entity_description.
- Each article must be related to its upper-level chapter(장) or section(절).
- Articles within the same chapter or section should be linked with inferred relationships if their contents are semantically related.

-Steps-
1. Identify all entities. For each identified entity, extract the following information:
- entity_name: Name of the entity, capitalized
- entity_type: One of the following types: [organization,person,geo,event,date,room,phone]
- entity_description: 반드시 **한국어로 작성**하십시오. 해당 엔터티의 성격, 역할, 포함된 내용을 한국어로 서술합니다.
Format each entity as ("entity"<|><entity_name><|><entity_type><|><entity_description>)
 
2. From the entities identified in step 1, identify all pairs of (source_entity, target_entity) that are *clearly related* to each other.
For each pair of related entities, extract the following information:
- source_entity: name of the source entity, as identified in step 1
- target_entity: name of the target entity, as identified in step 1
- relationship_description: explanation as to why you think the source entity and the target entity are related to each other
- relationship_strength: a numeric score indicating strength of the relationship between the source entity and target entity
 Format each relationship as ("relationship"<|><source_entity><|><target_entity><|><relationship_description><|><relationship_strength>)
 
3. Return output in **Korean** as a single list of all the entities and relationships identified in steps 1 and 2. Use **##** as the list delimiter.
 
4. When finished, output <|COMPLETE|>

######################
-Examples-
######################
Example 1: 
Entity_types: ORGANIZATION,EVENT,CHAPTER,ARTICLE,PAGE
Text:
page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 총 칙

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 1 조 (설립목적) 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 정관
content: 제 1 장 제 2 조 (명칭) 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 

page: 1
headline: 가람교육재단 운영규정
content: 제 1 조 (목적) 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다.

######################
Output:
("entity"<|>가람교육재단<|>ORGANIZATION<|>교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지하는 재단)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>CHAPTER<|>제 1 장 총칙: 가람교육재단 정관의 첫 번째 장으로, 설립목적과 명칭에 관한 내용을 포함함. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 1 조 설립목적: 본 재단은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지함을 목적으로 한다. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 2 조 명칭: 본 재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단이라 한다. 이 내용은 가림교육재단 정관 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>가람교육재단 운영규정 제 1 조<|>ARTICLE<|>제 1 조 목적: 이 규정은 가람교육재단의 운영에 필요한 사항을 정함을 목적으로 한다. 이 내용은 가람교육재단 운영규정 문서에서 추출함. 1페이지에 위치함.)
##
("entity"<|>페이지 1<|>PAGE<|>가람교육재단 정관 문서의 1페이지에는 제 1 장 총칙과 제 1 조 설립목적, 제 2 조 명칭이 포함되어 있음. 가람교육재단 운영규정의 1페이지에는 제 1 조 목적이 포함되어 있음.)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 1 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 2 조는 제 1 장 총칙에 포함되어 있음<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>가람교육재단의 설립목적은 교육기관의 설립 및 운영을 통해 공익에 이바지하는 것임<|>9)
##
("relationship"<|>가람교육재단<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>재단의 명칭은 가람교육재단임<|>9)
##
("relationship"<|>페이지 1<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 장<|>제 1 장 총칙은 페이지 1에 위치함<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>페이지 1<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 1 조<|>제 1 조 설립목적은 페이지 1에 위치함<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>페이지 1<|>가람교육재단 정관 제 2 조<|>제 2 조 명칭은 페이지 1에 위치함<|>10)
##
("relationship"<|>페이지 1<|>가람교육재단 운영규정 제 1 조<|>제 1 조 목적은 페이지 1에 위치함<|>10)
##
<|COMPLETE|>

Text:
Title: Hansung University Computer Engineering Department Teaching Assistant Recruitment Announcement
Content:
Hello, this is the administrative assistant from the Department of Computer Engineering.
Currently, we are recruiting administrative and teaching assistants for the Department of Computer Engineering.

1. Recruitment Fields
- Administrative Assistant (Day shift) or Teaching Assistant (Day shift)
- Number of openings: 1 for each (select either Administrative or Teaching Assistant)

2. Qualifications
- Academic requirement: A bachelor's degree or higher
- Must not have any disqualifying factors for assistant appointment
- Preferred: Majors in IT or Computer-related fields

3. Working Conditions
- 5 days a week, daytime
- Daytime: 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM
- During vacation periods: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
- Expected start date: December 15, 2024
- Administrative Assistant: Hansung University Jiseong Building 105, IT Engineering Academic Team Office
- Teaching Assistant: Hansung University Engineering Building A 104, Department of Computer Engineering Office
- Contract: 1 year (renewable once for up to 2 years)

4. Documents to Submit
- Resume (use the attached format, include a photo)
- Submission deadline: November 29, Friday

5. Recruitment Process
- 1st round: Document review (Only candidates selected will be notified individually)
- 2nd round: Interview (Only for those who pass the first round)
- Additional documents for successful candidates: University graduation certificate, transcript, resident registration, etc. to be provided later.

######################
